message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $120 to purchase the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can make it work for $130. Would you consider selling the product at that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about we settle on $145?
I'll do my best to accommodate your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Is that within your range?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're serious about making a deal. I'm willing to make one last concession - how about we meet at $142.50?
